text: Uske baap ne (Moosa se) kaha “main chahta hoon ke apni in do betiyon mein se ek ka nikah tumhare saath kardoon bashart yeh ke tum aath(eight) saal tak mere haan mulazimat karo, aur agar dus saal purey kardo to yeh tumhari marzi hai. Main tumpar sakhti nahin karna chahta, tum insha Allah mujhey neik aadmi paogey”
